result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (2nd) and Operating w/ PAC (2nd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (2nd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (2nd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Jordan J Wagner was found guilty of OWI (2nd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: with huber for work/treatment if meets jail criteria.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jordan J Wagner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Order for intox driver assessment and safety plan

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 10:30am
INCLUDES 15CM2158 & 16CM360
State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher.  Deft appears with Atty David Casey.

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
Amend criminal complaint in 16CM360 of Ct. 1 OWI (2nd) to OWI (3rd) and Ct. 2 Operating w/ PAC (2nd) to Operating w/PAC (3rd)
15CM2158:
Ct. 2 Operating w/ PAC (2nd) >> D&RI
16CM360:
Ct. 2 Operating with PAC (3rd) >> dismissed outright
Ct. 3 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
COURT grants above
PLEA: 
15CM2158:
Ct. 1 OWI (2nd) >> NO CONTEST
16CM360:
Ct. 1 OWI (3rd)) >> NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 15CM2158 Ct. 1- Pay $1,429 fine inclusive of all costs including DNA sample and surcharge. Serve 5 days MCJ. Jail may be with huber release for work or treatment if meets jail criteria. Deft has 45 days to report to jail. 12 months driver's license revocation, granted administrative credit for time already served. 12 months IID to be installed immediately, time will not begin to run against deft license until obtain's valid license. 6 points against driving record. Complete AODA assessment with follow through, does not need to duplicate if completed already. Pay $165.00 AODA fee. 
COURT ORDERS: 16CM360 Ct. 1- w/hold sentencing. 2 years probation. CONDITIONS: Comply with SSTOP requirements. Pay $1,694 fine inclusive of all costs including DNA sample and surcharge. Impose 45 days MCJ, stay 31 days jail. Serve 14 days jail pursuant to SSTOP, concurrent to 15CM2158 Ct. 1. May be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or EMP if meets jail criteria. If violates SSTOP requirements, 31 days can be lifted. 24 months driver's license revocation, granted administrative credit for time already served, concurrent to 15CM2158 Ct. 1. 24 months IID to be installed immediately, time will not begin to run against deft license until obtain's valid license, concurrent to 15CM2158 Ct. 1. 6 points against driving record. AODA assessment with follow through. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. 
COURT notes zero days credit. 

Adj: 10:50am
Plea hearing on May 25, 2016 at 10:15 am.
Plea hearing on May 4, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 01-08-2016 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial at 02-10-2016 01:30 pm.
Jury Trial at 02-24-2016 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jordan J Wagner
Current: 2406 Weston Ave, Schofield, WI 54476 United States  (Effective: 12-07-2015)
Prior: 2055 Tower Rd, Kronenwetter, WI 54455

Shall not consume alcohol.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents  Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 within 5 business days. May work @ Michael's but may not drink.
